naslov: Luksuzna kuća 250 m2 s bazenom uz Park prirode Medvednica (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Luksuzna kuća uz Park prirode Medvednica – oaza mira i elegancije. Na jednoj od najpoželjnijih lokacija, uz samu Zelenu magistralu i tik uz granicu Parka prirode Medvednica, prodaje se vrhunski građena kuća koja pruža savršen spoj luksuza, prirode i funkcionalnosti. Raspored prostora: Prva etaža: elegantan ulazni hodnik, open space dnevni boravak s kaminom, moderna kuhinja, blagovaonica, zatvoreni balkon, jedna spavaća soba, kupaonica s WC-om te povezana garaža. Gornja etaža: pet prostorija, uključujući tri spavaće sobe, igraonicu i spremište. Donja etaža: grijani bazen, jacuzzi, ležaljke, ljetna kuhinja – sve s pogledom koji oduzima dah i uz opuštajući zvuk prirode. Zadnji nivo: uređeni vrt s roštiljem i vanjskim WC-om – idealno za druženja i ljetne večeri. Solarni paneli su sjajan dodatni benefit na luksuznoj kući, jer donose spoj ekološke održivosti, energetske nezavisnosti i moderne tehnologije, drastično smanjuju troškove za struju, posebno u velikim kućama sa većom potrošnjom. Ova prostrana vila nudi 250 m² stambenog prostora raspoređenih na više etaža, uz 619 m² pomno uređenog vrta. Okružena obiljem zelenila i netaknute prirode, idealna je za sve koji traže mir, privatnost i komfor, a opet žele biti nadomak grada. ------------------------------------- Za sve dodatne informacije molim da nam se obratite na: + 385 98 196 6835 +385 91 278 9999 +385 1 211 0212 RE/MAX CITY 2 Mlinska 23, Samobor Sve informacije dane od agenta smatraju se važećim, no moraju se zasebno procijeniti. ------------------------ Luxury house next to Medvednica Nature Park – an oasis of peace and elegance. In one of the most desirable locations, right next to the Green Highway and right next to the border of Medvednica Nature Park, a superbly built house is for sale that offers the perfect blend of luxury, nature and functionality. This spacious villa offers 250 m² of living space spread over several floors, with 619 m² of carefully landscaped garden. Surrounded by abundant greenery and untouched nature, it is ideal for anyone looking for peace, privacy and comfort, yet still wanting to be within easy reach of the city. Layout: First floor: elegant entrance hall, open space living room with fireplace, modern kitchen, dining room, enclosed balcony, one bedroom, bathroom with toilet and attached garage. Upper floor: five rooms, including three bedrooms, a games room and storage room. Lower floor: heated pool, jacuzzi, deck chairs, summer kitchen – all with breathtaking views and the relaxing sounds of nature. Last level: landscaped garden with barbecue and outdoor toilet - ideal for gatherings and summer evenings. Solar panels are a great additional benefit on a luxury house, because they bring a combination of ecological sustainability, energy independence and modern technology, drastically reducing electricity costs, especially in large houses with higher consumption. The house is currently used for tourist rental through a well-known booking platform, which provides additional value as an investment property. The perfect property for those looking to live or invest in a luxurious haven just minutes from the hustle and bustle of the city. ---------------------- For any additional information, please contact us at: + 385 98 196 6835 +385 91 278 9999 +385 1 211 0212 RE/MAX CITY 2 Mlinska 23, Samobor All information provided by the agent is considered valid, but must be evaluated separately.
